name: feistel-cipher
description: Feistel cipher implementation for (almost) format-preserving encryption

scripts.test: mocha 'test/src/typescript/node.spec.ts' --require ts-node/register && tsc && browserify ./dist/test/src/typescript/browser.spec.js -o dist/test/src/typescript/index.js && live-server --port=9001 --mount=/:test/src/typescript

author: Edgewhere <contact@edgewhere.fr>
